name: Slice and Bite
description:
Play as a pizza-delivering vampire in his magical tank carriage on their quest to satisfy hungry demon-customers in medieval Italy.

  • Double protagonist action for unique combat opportunities
  • Levels are always in motion and offer dynamic pace
  • Unique setting - medieval Italian folklore with a cartoony twist
  • Charming cast of silly vampires and demons that you can interact with

Contains depictions of cartoon violence and gore.

Demo is still a WIP,  product not final.
